job description:
In this role, you will work on a wide variety of data science projects improve Neurotrack's cognitive assessment test and cognitive health platform. These projects will include improving our eye tracking technology using advanced computer vision techniques, analyzing new cognitive assessments, and optimizing customer engagement. You will work closely with the other engineers, product management, and the executive team as we define, design, and develop new products and features.

Responsibilities
  • Lead development and deployment of scalable AI solutions, including state-of-the-art eye tracking and gaze prediction algorithms
  • Ensure model performance in a production environment, i.e. not just fitting a model, but being held accountable for performance & reliability after deployment
  • Following best practices for software development of machine learning algorithms
  • Develop processes to monitor and analyze model/algorithm performance
  • Follow latest data science techniques and trends
Qualifications/Experience
  • 3+ years as a data scientist analyzing complex data sets
  • Experience with Python
  • Machine learning (clustering, decision trees, neural networks, etc.)
  • Statistics (regression, distributions, etc.)
  • Computer vision experience a plus
  • Commitment to good programming practices
Education
  • M.S. or Ph.D. in data science, physics, engineering, computer science, mathematics, statistics, or another data-centric technical field
